How many people are affected by spinocerebellar ataxia type 1 ?,"SCA1 affects 1 to 2 per 100,000 people worldwide.",GHR,spinocerebellar ataxia type 1
What are the genetic changes related to spinocerebellar ataxia type 1 ?,"Mutations in the ATXN1 gene cause SCA1. The ATXN1 gene provides instructions for making a protein called ataxin-1. This prot
